properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; Pentwater to Manistee MI; Grand Haven to Whitehall MI; South Haven to Holland MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI; Whitehall to Pentwater MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 29 at 10:36PM EST until March 1 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds increasing to 15 to 30 knots tonight and
lasting into the day on Sunday. Waves will reach the 4 to 7 foot
range north of Grand Haven and 3 to 5 feet to the south of Grand
Haven.

* WHERE...St Joseph to Manistee.

* WHEN...From 3 AM to 11 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds and waves will peak in the midday
hours of Sunday.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 PM EST SUNDAY
